com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.component

Interface ReadableDataAccessComponent<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The business model element to be stored or loaded with data from the database.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReadableDataAccessComponent, ReadableDynamoDBDataAccessComponentImpl, ReadableHibernateDataAccessComponentImpl

    public interface ReadableDataAccessComponent<T>
    The ReadableDataAccessComponent interface is a data access component. This is a strategy of a com.logitopia.common.persistence.dao.DataAccessObject that is responsible for providing components from reading data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.Class newClazz, Query findFilter)
      The find method will return a list of business models, having selected a list of active objects from the database that match the given filter.
      java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.Class newClazz, Query findFilter, int pageNumber, int pageSize)
      The find method will return a list of business models, having selected a list of active objects from the database that match the given filter.
      java.util.List<T> getAll(java.lang.Class newClazz)
      The getAll method will return a list of the business models, having selected a full list of active objects from the database.
      java.util.List<T> getAll(java.lang.Class newClazz, int pageNumber, int pageSize)
      The getAll method will return a paginated list of the business models, having selected a full list of active objects from the database.
      T getEntityByID(java.lang.Class newClazz, long id)
      The getEntityByID method will return an entity T that matches a given ID.
      T getEntityByID(java.lang.Class newClazz, T example)
      The getEntityByID method will return an entity T that matches a given ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        java.util.List<T> getAll(java.lang.Class newClazz)
        The getAll method will return a list of the business models, having selected a full list of active objects from the database. Note, this will only return active records (i.e. records that have not been deleted).
        Parameters:
        newClazz - The class of type T to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        List - A list of the business model E stored in the database.

      • getAll

        java.util.List<T> getAll(java.lang.Class newClazz,
                         int pageNumber,
                         int pageSize)
        The getAll method will return a paginated list of the business models, having selected a full list of active objects from the database. Note, this will only return active records (i.e. records that have not been deleted).
        Parameters:
        newClazz - The class of type T to be retrieved.
        pageNumber - The number of the page that you wish to retrieve.
        pageSize - The size of the page that you wish to retrieve.
        Returns:
        List - A list of the business model E stored in the database.

      • getEntityByID

        T getEntityByID(java.lang.Class newClazz,
                long id)
        The getEntityByID method will return an entity T that matches a given ID. The ID and class are provided to tell Hibernate which table to check and for what ID.
        Parameters:
        newClazz - The class of type T to be retrieved.
        id - The unique ID of the object to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A business model / entity that matches the given id. A null object will be returned if nothing matches that ID.

      • getEntityByID

        T getEntityByID(java.lang.Class newClazz,
                T example)
         throws DataAccessComponentException
        The getEntityByID method will return an entity T that matches a given ID. The ID and class are provided to tell Hibernate which table to check and for what ID.
        Parameters:
        newClazz - The class of type T to be retrieved.
        example - An entity loaded with the key values of the object to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A business model / entity that matches the given id. A null object will be returned if nothing matches that ID.
        Throws:
        DataAccessComponentException - when data cannot be read or has produced anomalous results.

      • find

        java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.Class newClazz,
                       Query findFilter)
        The find method will return a list of business models, having selected a list of active objects from the database that match the given filter. Note, this will only return active records (i.e. records that have not been deleted).
        Parameters:
        newClazz - The class of type T to be retrieved.
        findFilter - The filter to apply to the find operation.
        Returns:
        List - A list of the business model E stored in the database.

      • find

        java.util.List<T> find(java.lang.Class newClazz,
                       Query findFilter,
                       int pageNumber,
                       int pageSize)
        The find method will return a list of business models, having selected a list of active objects from the database that match the given filter. Note, this will only return active records (i.e. records that have not been deleted).
        Parameters:
        newClazz - The class of type T to be retrieved.
        findFilter - The filter to apply to the find operation.
        pageNumber - The number of the page that you wish to retrieve.
        pageSize - The size of the page that you wish to retrieve.
        Returns:
        List - A list of the business model E stored in the database.
